sentences.sContent: They’ve been married for eight years.
Married men earn 70 percent more than single men.
sentences.sCn: 已婚男子比单身男子多挣70%。

sentences.sContent: We’re getting married (= marrying ) next month.
When she first came to London, she was newly married and out of work.
sentences.sCn: 她初到伦敦时刚结婚，而且没有工作。

sentences.sContent: So, how do you like married life ?
sentences.sCn: 那么，你觉得婚后生活怎么样？

synos.tran: 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的

words.tran: 结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合，合并

trans.tranCn: 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的
trans.tranOther: having a husband or a wife
